bio:
I'm a results-driven professional with expertise in project management, strategic planning, marketing, and data analysis. With a proven track record of success in both corporate and entrepreneurial environments, I have led cross-functional teams and delivered successful projects of various sizes and scopes.

I have a deep understanding of strategic planning, analyzing market trends, identifying new opportunities, and developing plans to capitalize on them. My experience in B2B and B2C markets has given me a broad perspective on how to approach strategic planning, and I have a proven track record of helping businesses achieve their growth objectives.

In marketing, I have developed and executed campaigns across a variety of channels, including social media, email, and traditional advertising. I understand the importance of developing a strong brand identity and have helped businesses create compelling messaging and visuals that resonate with their target audience. My analytical skills also come into play when analyzing campaign performance and making data-driven decisions to optimize results.

I'm proficient in Excel and other data analysis software and have experience creating data visualizations and reports to communicate findings to stakeholders. My ability to work with data has helped me uncover valuable insights that have driven business decisions and improved overall performance.

I thrive in fast-paced environments and enjoy working collaboratively with teams to achieve common goals. I believe in continuous learning and have a growth mindset that drives me to continually seek out new challenges and opportunities to expand my skill set.

Overall, my diverse skill set, combined with my proven track record of success, makes me a valuable asset to any team or organization looking to achieve growth and drive results.
The escrow or non-escrow projects. Non-escrow project terms are 25-50% up front with the remainder due upon completion.

abstrac: Being an experience Digital Marketing expert, I will provide you the best of Services which are up-to-date and meet the standard of upcoming trends of industry and advancement.
bio:
I am Digital Marketing Specialist and Web developer. Furthermore, 5 year experience in Web development, Search Engine Optimization and Graphic Designing. Likewise, I have full command on WordPress expert and Webmaster.

Completed several projects with big firms providing result-oriented professional work like:

>>Worked with Leading companies e.g. "Carrefour" as Social Media Manager,
>> Designed oodles of business identity logos,
>>Developed several websites as attached here,
>>Prepared Digital Marketing Plans and served to small/medium business companies,
>>Creative, Energetic and Potential.

MY SKILLS:

>>WordPress (Website development, Advance Theme/Plugin Editing, Posting, Installation of Plugins, Mobile Compatible version WP touch).

>>Site Migration/Hosting, Social Media Integration etc.

>>Email Marketing Mailchimp, aweber etc.
 
>>HTML5 / XHTML / CSS 3.0 / Bootstrap / JavaScript / jQuery / PHP / MySQL / C / C++ / CodeIgniter / Zend / Drupal / Joomla / Magento, cPanel/WHM/VSPS Hosting management, DNS Management, Name Server Management, Domain management etc.

>> SEO on WordPress based Site using Yoast, All in one, Google Tools & Products webmaster tools, Google Analytics, AdSense, Keyword Research etc.

>>Site Security / Speed optimization / AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages).

>>SEO (Onsite and Offsite, Including Social Media Sites management Facebook, twitter, YouTube etc.)/Internet Marketing including mobile marketing like Moz, Hoot suit etc.

>>Graphics Editing (Photoshop), Video Editing, Data Entry, Internet Research, MS Office, Google Docs & App management etc.

Thank you.

Kind Regards,
Mohammad Bin Inam

>>Hours of Work:

I can provide 40 hour of working time per week as well I can also work extended hours on additional charges. I can also complete project which have to be done in limited hour and can provide you the results within due date.  I can also work on weekends if you are in hurry and want to complete your project before expected date.
Being passionate about the work I am doing, I can provide best of results. Beside this, I am highly experienced in the services I am providing.

>>Payment Terms:

Payment is based in the type of task you are offering. Here is the detail description of Payment Terms:
1. Fixed Price:
In Fixed price task, we will set several milestones and will agree on amount of payment to be deliver after accomplishing of each milestone. We will set the due date and will split our work, based on how big the project is.
This method will help us both to work efficiently and we can keep track of work being done.
2. Task-Based:
This type of Payment is based on task in which we will agree upon when to deliver the payment i.e. before completion of task or after completion of task.
3. Hourly Based:
We can also negotiate on a certain project on the hourly basis. We can decide upon weekly basis, how many hours of work in each week. We will negotiate on when to pay the payment.

Note: I am ready to negotiate Price wise.

>>Communication Style:
I prefer Skype video calling as we are talking face to face, it helps both parties to help them understand our potential, our mission and type of work they are demanding.
Furthermore, I am also available on WhatsApp, Zoom, Messenger, LinkedIn.

bio:
Greetings!

I am a Freelance Penetration Tester with significant and well-diversified experience in multiple Pentesting domains including Web Application Pentesting, Network Pentesting, Mobile Application Pentesting, Source Code Review and RedTeaming.

I've had the privilege of auditing and hardening the security of a number of industry-leading organizations, the scope of work including Enterprise IT networks, Web/Mobile applications, and APIs.


---- Service Description

1. Manual and Automated Web Application Penetration Testing based on OWASP TOP 10
2. Network Penetration Testing
3. Vulnerability Assessment 
4. Source Code Review
5. Mobile Applications Penetration Testing

My core competency lies in performing black and gray box testing, on live web applications and networks or in lab environments as well as Mobile Based Applications. I am familiar with all common attack vectors and mitigation techniques, as well as finding known to public exploits known as 1days. Even though most of my work is confidential I can share stripped down vulnerability assessment samples if required to do so.


---- Tools I work best with

WebSec Tools: BurpSuite Professional, sqlmap, Sublist3r, nmap, Nikto2, Wapiti, wpscan.
NetSec Tools: Metasploit, Empire, PowerShell, tcpdump, MITMF, ettercap-ng, OpenVAS.
Technologies & OS: Kali Linux, WordPress, Darknet, TOR, Wayback Machine, Shodan, numerous github scripts. much much more..

abstrac: Full-stack Developer: Building robust and engaging applications
bio:
Full-stack Developer with 2+ Years of Experience

Hi, my name is Umar Abdullah, and I am a Full-Stack developer with a passion for building robust and engaging web and mobile applications. I am highly skilled in front-end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React JS, Next JS,Express, Nodejs and Redux Toolkit, and I have extensive experience in back-end development using Node JS and JavaScript. My expertise in databases such as MongoDB and MySQL ensures that your data is stored securely and efficiently.

I am also experienced in mobile app development using React Native, which allows me to provide full-spectrum development services to my clients. Furthermore, my background in graphic design helps me create visually appealing user interfaces that meet the needs of your users.

As a student of BBIT, I have a strong foundation in software engineering principles and a desire to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies. My commitment to providing excellent customer support ensures that you will have a positive experience working with me, and I am available 24/7 to address any questions or concerns.

Thank you for considering me for your Full-Stack development needs.

abstrac: ideil. — official Laravel partner company from Ukraine
bio:
We are a web development company of 30+ high-skilled professionals.

Our main focus is custom software development. This is the thing that we enjoy doing the most as it is always a new challenge for us to take. 

The web stack we're working with involves the hottest and at the same time battle-tested solutions and frameworks — Laravel, Vue.js, Nginx, MySQL. 

To offer our clients seamless support and full-cycle service we have a team of mobile developers that collaborate tightly with our backend team. This helps us minimize the communication barriers that are often present in distributed teams.

Communication is the key for every successful partnership and we value every bit of your time and hear every word. You make yourself clear on the topic and we distribute responsibilities among the members of the team. Tasks just get done.

We have a keen sense of satisfaction and you can experience it as well with your next delivered product. Be it a brilliant design, sophisticated technology or carefully considered details, people can't resist this magic.

bio:
Professional translations Language in perfection

We translate with passion, tradition, and knowledge. Through our life and passion, we offer an everyday reference to our languages, as well as the necessary knowledge for professional translations.

We can translate any European language pair for you through our large and experienced network.

There’s nothing that we can’t do or arrange for you!

We all want to be heard and understood. That is why it is so important that translations are not done only with the head, but also with the heart.

It’s the little things that matter in life. It’s the same with our work. Only those who know the life, culture, and people behind the language, can also convey this language.

We translate with passion and are fortunate enough to be able to offer you professional translations with dedication. Join our satisfied clients and get convinced of what we can make possible!

Shall we get started?

Insights into our work/translations

• Offer •
Simply send us your documents, websites, or inquiries simply via message and e-mail.

• Pricing •
Our prices are as individual as our clients. There are many factors to consider, but we will surely find a solution.

• Result •
We will send you your translation by the agreed deadline. If you are not satisfied, we will take care of it.

bio:
Company Profile

Metacron Systems LLP is a highly experienced information technology firm with professionals and offers consulting services in the areas of Custom Software Development, Web Application development, Mobile App design & development, Quality Assurance and implementation. Metacron Systems has considerable experience delivering solutions in single and multi operating system environments.
 
Metacron Systems through its alliances is able to attain goals and objectives which one company cannot achieve alone. These are based on a win-win mindset, mutual trust, commitment and the sharing of risks and rewards to benefit customers directly. Our professionals have several ton of person-years of experience consulting with organization and implementing our proposed and customer desired solutions. 


IT Services

Our Technology Consulting focuses on delivering solutions across the following critical business areas:

 E-commerce (B2B /B2C Systems)
 Mobile Application Development
 Web/Application Development 
 Product Design and MVP
 Progressive Web Application Development
 Enterprise Application Integration

Our Mission

To provide highest quality services and solutions
to our clients and a productive and innovative environment for our employees to excel in the world of Information Technology.

Our Values

Custom Solutions based on Custom Requirement

Metacron creates a solution which is optimized to your requirements; Custom by default. Contrast this with one size fits all bundles sometimes promoted by companies that rely mainly on product sales. Because we are vendor-independent, we can select the best-fit solution to minimize your Total Cost of Ownership, and maximize your Quality of Service.

We work 40 hours a week. With an affordable pricing range of $15 to $25 an hour.

We work on milestone basis.

Our process includes: 

Analysis and requirement gathering of the project.
Scope preparation
Development
Testing
Execution
Maintenance
